title: (x) Carling beer logo - (similar to) Arrow {Eduardo}
content:
somebody can tell me which font carling used for its logo   
   
 [http://www.carling.com/images/generic/carling\_logo\_backup.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20120210215218/http:/www.carling.com/images/generic/carling_logo_backup.gif)
author: anonymous

comments.content: It seems to be based on [Treacy](http://web.archive.org/web/20120210215218/http:/www.treacyfaces.com/)'s Arrow.
